long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Matrics Event Manager is a Chrome extension designed to streamline the event creation process on Meetup.com. With a single click, it automatically fills in the event fields on the Meetup.com form.

Usage:

- Open Meetup.com and start creating a new event.
- Click the Matrics Event Manager icon in your Chrome toolbar.
- The event fields will be auto-filled with preset information.


Note: This extension is designed for users who frequently create similar events and want to speed up the process.
